titleStmt.title: The hould of humilitie adioyned to the Castle of courtesie. Compiled by Iames Yates Seruingman. Captious conceipts, good reader doe dismis: and friendly weigh the willing minde of his, which more doth write for pleasure then for praise, whose worthlesse workers are simplie pend alwaies.
Castell of courtesie. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Yates, James, servingman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe, dwelling in Distasse Lane, neere the signe of the Castle,

notesStmt.note: Another issue of part 2 of: Yates, James. The castell of courtesie.
"The chariot of chastitie .. Also A dialogue betwene Diana and Venus" has separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Distasse Lane, neere the signe of the Castle
